title: When was Type Styles 101 written?
content:
Does anyone know when Jonathan Hoefler wrote the Type Styles 101 article? I’m citing it in a research paper and I can’t find a date within the flash movie.

 [‹ Garamond quotes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202208/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30572 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lucida Grande vs. Lucida Sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202208/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29822 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
Hi James

Probably best if you ask Jonathan directly.

[info@typography.com](mailto:info@typography.com)

I cited his article ’On Classifying Type’ (which I think was the accompanying essay to Type Styles 101), which was originally published in [Emigré #42](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202208/http:/www.emigre.com/EMag.php?issue=42) 1997.
